options.name: PIA
options.description: Payment in advance

options.name: Net 7
options.description: Payment seven days after invoice date

options.name: Net 10
options.description: Payment ten days after invoice date

options.name: Net 30
options.description: Payment 30 days after invoice date

options.name: Net 60
options.description: Payment 60 days after invoice date

options.name: Net 90
options.description: Payment 90 days after invoice date

options.name: EOM
options.description: End of month

options.name: 21 MFI
options.description: 21st of the month following invoice date

options.name: 1% 10 Net 30
options.description: 1% discount if payment received within ten days otherwise payment 30 days after invoice date

options.name: COD
options.description: Cash on delivery

options.name: Cash account
options.description: Account conducted on a cash basis, no credit

options.name: Letter of credit
options.description: A documentary credit confirmed by a bank, often used for export

options.name: Bill of exchange
options.description: A promise to pay at a later date, usually supported by a bank

options.name: CND
options.description: Cash next delivery

options.name: CBS
options.description: Cash before shipment

options.name: CIA
options.description: Cash in advance

options.name: CWO
options.description: Cash with order

options.name: 1MD
options.description: Monthly credit payment of a full month's supply

options.name: 2MD
options.description: Monthly credit payment of a full month's supply plus an extra calendar month

options.name: Contra
options.description: Payment from the customer offset against the value of supplies purchased from the customer

options.name: Stage payment
options.description: Payment of agreed amounts at stage
